Package com.atakmap.android.maps.graphics

Class GLCapture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.graphics.GLCapture
  • public abstract class GLCapture
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class used to capture GL rendering in a Bitmap. The capture will happen asynchronously on the GL thread; delivery of the captured pixels will occur on a separate user thread.

    This class takes care of the setup and teardown of the offscreen textures and buffer objects; subclasses are responsible for implementing the rendering code to produce the scene to be captured.

      Nested Classes

    • Constructor Detail

      • GLCapture

        public GLCapture​(android.opengl.GLSurfaceView view)
        Creates a new instance. The capture region is set to the extents of the specified GLSurfaceView.
        Parameters:
        view - A GLSurfaceView instance. The instance will be used to queue the offscreen capture on the GL context thread.

      • GLCapture

        public GLCapture​(android.opengl.GLSurfaceView view,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        view - A GLSurfaceView instance. The instance will be used to queue the offscreen capture on the GL context thread.
        x - The x-coordinate of the region of the frame buffer to capture
        y - The y-coordinate of the region of the frame buffer to capture
        width - The width of the region of the frame buffer to capture
        height - The height of the region of the frame buffer to capture

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        protected abstract void draw()
        Subclasses should override to perform the GL rendering they want captured for the callback.

      • capture

        public final void capture​(GLCapture.CaptureCallback callback)
        Performs an asynchronous capture. The callback will always receive an invocation of GLCapture.CaptureCallback.onCaptureStarted(GLCapture) when the capture begins and one of GLCapture.CaptureCallback.onCaptureComplete(GLCapture, Bitmap) or GLCapture.CaptureCallback.onCaptureError(GLCapture, Throwable) when the capture has either completed successfully or terminated due to an error.
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback for the capture. May not be null.

      • readPixels

        protected void readPixels​(GLCapture.CaptureCallback callback)

      • compress

        public static void compress​(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                            int quality,
                            android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat compressFmt,
                            java.io.File target,
                            boolean recycleOnExit)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Compresses a bitmap to a target file.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - A bitmap
        quality - The quality, 0 for lowest quality, 100 for best quality
        compressFmt - The compression format
        target - The target file
        recycleOnExit - true to recycle the bitmap before the method returns, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an issue writing the bitmap to a file.
